titles.title: Urging the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to reevaluate the endangerment and cause or contribute findings regarding greenhouse gases signed on December 7, 2009.
Urging the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to reevaluate the endangerment and cause or contribute findings regarding greenhouse gases signed on December 7, 2009.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Environment.

bill.summary: Finds the endangerment and cause or contribute findings for greenhouse gases signed by the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) on December 7, 2009, unacceptable. Disapproves of such signing and urges the Administrator to reevaluate such findings.
